headerDisplay:
HomeBridge plugin for RoomMe by Intellithings - Specific people room level presence detection.
Please visit the [Project Readme](https://github.com/nitaybz/homebridge-roomme#readme) for proper installation guide.
footerDisplay: [Enable RoomMe API](https://github.com/nitaybz/homebridge-roomme#enable-roomme-api) from their app and connect it to HomeBridge. [click for more information](https://github.com/nitaybz/homebridge-roomme#enable-roomme-api) | Created by @nitaybz

anyoneSensor.title: Anyone Sensor
anyoneSensor.description: When enabled, it creates an extra occupancy service on each room which represent "Anyone". It will trigger when someone is in the room and will turn off when no one is in the room. read more here

leftHomeSwitch.title: "Left Home" Switch
leftHomeSwitch.description: When enabled, it creates a switch in HomeKit for each user. When turned ON, it will remove this user from the last room he has been detected in. read more here

host.title: Server Hostname  **ADVANCED**
host.description: Hostname of the generated server.  read more here

port.title: Server Port  **ADVANCED**
port.description: Port of the generated server.  read more here

secured.title: Secured Server (HTTPS) - use only if you have a valid SSL certificate  **ADVANCED**
secured.description: Creates HTTPS secure server with SSL certificate that you provide

sslKeyFile.title: SSL Key File Path  **ADVANCED**
sslKeyFile.description: Path to your SSL key file. read more here

sslCertFile.title: SSL Certificate File Path  **ADVANCED**
sslCertFile.description: Path to your SSL certificate file. read more here

debug.title: Enable Debug Logs
debug.description: When checked, the plugin will produce extra logs for debugging purposes
